channel.title: Running server
channel.description:
How do i get my server up wid my ips? i got chaos-scape.servegame.org and i got chaos-scape.no-ip.biz....can any1 tell me how to get my server to have 1 of those ips.....if any1 wants to ask i dont have a router
[b][u]REWARD[/u][/b]
i will make the person who helped to admin on my server.

item.title: Running server
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

[quote=“AndyJay123, post:3, topic:197589”]Allow your server port through your firewall.
All I can suggest is www.no-ip.com Other should be able to LogIn to your Server, using the IP you created on there.[/quote]

yeah…well i already got a no-ip acc and dyndns with a host…and i already got the port aloud on my firewall all i need is to get it up online

Read full topic

item.title: Running server
item.dc:creator: @AndyJay123 AndyJay123
item.description:
@AndyJay123 wrote:

Allow your server port through your firewall.
All I can suggest is www.no-ip.com Other should be able to LogIn to your Server, using the IP you created on there.

Read full topic

item.title: Running server
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Then you can’t port forward, so those IP’s wont work.

Read full topic
